instruction: Can you provide more information on the potential undervaluation of global small caps and the financial sector that was indicated by the index-level price-to-forward-earnings ratio at the end of Q1 2020?
output: Sure, the index-level price-to-forward-earnings ratio indicated potential undervaluation of global small caps relative to large caps and the financials sector relative to communication services at the end of Q1 2020. This suggests that there may be opportunities for investors to find value in these areas.
